sub_title: Sr Marketing Program Manager at Ring / Amazon Europe
summary:
I am a versatile professional at the intersection of program management, project management, and marketing operations, dedicated to orchestrating seamless execution of strategic initiatives and marketing campaigns.

With a deep understanding of content development, localisation and strategic cross team collaboration, I specialise in driving creative project excellence.

My communication skills enable me to bridge gaps between stakeholders, while my approach, rooted in data-driven decision-making, enables me to continually enhance marketing campaign performance.

Accomplishments:
Ring Europe:
- Localised 187 videos to 7 languages for Q1 2021 launches 
- Streamlined localisation processes to manage 33% time savings
- Managed first European-led GTM launch
- Launched first recruitment campaign for the EU region 
- Co-produced video shoots in South Africa and Estonia

Cheil MENA
Initiated and produced a series of social video content outperforming KPIs
+365% VTR
+83% CTR
+320% ER
-79% CPM

education.field_of_study: International Business Management, Marketing and Communication

profile_positions.description:
- Manages delivery of content requests from partner teams (GTM, Product Marketing, Comms, Channel Marketing, .com) ensuring smooth process and resource management 
- Manages delivery of ongoing content development of always on streams, including photography, UGC, stories and testimonials
- Partners closey with Product marketing to deliver new content solutions to key customer challenges
- Manages GTM content creation and localisation and approaches for localisation balancing resources vs impact
- Responsible for execution of major operational projects
profile_positions.title: Sr Marketing Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project Management
- Leads the creation and successful execution of a robust content marketing production pipeline, including defining and managing performance metrics.
- Manages the workflow for incoming content production requests, working with stakeholders to understand requirements and priorities, and planning implementations resulting in optimal ratio of resources to deliverable output. 
- Works backwards from customer requirements to identify content needs and develop a roadmap, processes, and plan for addressing content gaps. 
- Be the key point of contact between the creative team and stakeholders from all streams (GTM, Brand and Performance, Channel Marketing, .com) for briefing, feedback and approvals.
- Synthesizes complex technical and business concepts into clear and concise messaging that drives awareness, consideration, and adoption. 

Content Creation
- Builds and executes customer-focused messaging and content assets, ranging from market specific demo/install video content and photography to copy, OOH and paid media assets. 
-Works closely with the creative team on the whole process of asset creation. 

Localisation 
- Designs and implements a localisation strategy where each piece of content is designed for or adapted to its own specific market, partnering with a localisation agency to ensure maximal content output and quality control.
profile_positions.title: Content Marketing Manager

profile_positions.company: What Doesn't Suck? Adventure Travel Video
profile_positions.description:
"What Doesn't Suck?" is a top video travel platform started in the UAE in 2015 with over 12 million video views and 175,000 worldwide viewers. Headed by a French and an American couple, Jeff and Anne, they continue to find engaging and entertaining ways to introduce their audience to various adventure destinations around the world in unique and fast-paced video episodes and social media content and travel guides from Zanzibar to Egypt, Nepal to Iceland. 
The have worked with brands like Emirates, OSN, Hertz, Hilton, Armani, Lonely Planet, and Trip Advisor.

"What Doesn't Suck" specializes in: 
- Content creation
- Social media management/consulting
- Travel photography
- Social media optimization
- Videography 
- Post-production video editing 
- Original branded content

Clients: 
BMW Middle East, BMW Saudi Arabia, BMW Oman, BMW AGMC
MINI Middle East, MINI Saudi Arabia, MINI AGMC
HighBridge
GermaScout 

Platforms:
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram 


Serviceplan Middle East is the Dubai-based MENA hub of the Serviceplan Group. 
The Serviceplan Group is the largest and most diversified owner-managed and partner-managed agency group in Europe with offices in Munich, Hamburg, Berlin, Milan, Vienna, Zurich, and Brussels. 
In Dubai, Serviceplan Middle East is a full-service agency specializing in online & offline creation, dialogue marketing, social marketing, performance marketing, and strategic consultancy. 
To date, it has successfully integrated the following international clients in the Arab market: BMW, MINI, Continental, Lufthansa, and Rolls Royce, including strong regional brands in the hotel, insurance, and consumer industries.
